trans-unit.source: How to make a phone call from Twilio (PHP) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to make a phone call from Twilio (PHP) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Samples are for PHP application.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Samples are for PHP application.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how you can use Twilio to make a call from a PHP web page hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows you how you can use Twilio to make a call from a PHP web page hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The resulting application will prompt the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screen shot.
trans-unit.target: The resulting application will prompt the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screen shot.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure Call Form Using Twilio and PHP</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure Call Form Using Twilio and PHP</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You'll need to do the following to use the code in this topic:
trans-unit.target: You'll need to do the following to use the code in this topic:

trans-unit.source: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.
trans-unit.target: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Twilio, evaluate pricing at <linkText>http://www.twilio.com/pricing[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To get started with Twilio, evaluate pricing at <linkText>http://www.twilio.com/pricing[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: You can sign up for a trial account at <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: You can sign up for a trial account at <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see <linkText>http://www.twilio.com/api[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see <linkText>http://www.twilio.com/api[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Obtain the Twilio library for PHP.
trans-unit.target: Obtain the Twilio library for PHP.

trans-unit.source: You can download it from GitHub (<linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php[twilio_php_github]</linkText><title></title>) or install it as a PEAR package.
trans-unit.target: You can download it from GitHub (<linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php[twilio_php_github]</linkText><title></title>) or install it as a PEAR package.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure SDK for PHP.
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure SDK for PHP.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of the SDK and instructions on installing it, see <linkText>Set up the Azure SDK for PHP[setup_php_sdk]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For an overview of the SDK and instructions on installing it, see <linkText>Set up the Azure SDK for PHP[setup_php_sdk]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The following HTML code shows how to build a web page (callform.html) that retrieves user data for making a call:
trans-unit.target: The following HTML code shows how to build a web page (callform.html) that retrieves user data for making a call:

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to build a web page (makecall.php) which is called when the user submits the form displayed by callform.html.
trans-unit.target: The following code shows how to build a web page (makecall.php) which is called when the user submits the form displayed by callform.html.

trans-unit.source: The code shown below creates the call message and generates the call.
trans-unit.target: The code shown below creates the call message and generates the call.

trans-unit.source: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to $sid and $token in the code below.)
trans-unit.target: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to $sid and $token in the code below.)

trans-unit.source: In addition to making the call, makecall.php displays some call metadata (example shown in screenshot below).
trans-unit.target: In addition to making the call, makecall.php displays some call metadata (example shown in screenshot below).

trans-unit.source: For more information about call metadata, see <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/call#instance-properties[twilio_call_properties]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about call metadata, see <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/call#instance-properties[twilio_call_properties]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure Call Response Using Twilio and PHP</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure Call Response Using Twilio and PHP</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The next step is to deploy your application to Azure Websites.
trans-unit.target: The next step is to deploy your application to Azure Websites.

trans-unit.source: The following articles contain the information for creating a website and deploying your code with Git, FTP, or WebMatrix (though not all information in each article is relevant):
trans-unit.target: The following articles contain the information for creating a website and deploying your code with Git, FTP, or WebMatrix (though not all information in each article is relevant):

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and deploy using Git[website-git]</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and deploy using Git[website-git]</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and Deploy Using FTP[website-ftp]</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and Deploy Using FTP[website-ftp]</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create and deploy a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site using WebMatrix[website-webmatrix]</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create and deploy a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site using WebMatrix[website-webmatrix]</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in PHP on Azure.
trans-unit.target: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in PHP on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.
trans-unit.target: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.
trans-unit.target: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.

trans-unit.source: For information about using Azure storage blobs in PHP, see <linkText>Using Azure Storage with PHP Applications[howto_blob_storage_php]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about using Azure storage blobs in PHP, see <linkText>Using Azure Storage with PHP Applications[howto_blob_storage_php]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For information about using SQL Database in PHP, see <linkText>Using SQL Database with PHP Applications[howto_sql_azure_php]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about using SQL Database in PHP, see <linkText>Using SQL Database with PHP Applications[howto_sql_azure_php]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The makecall.php code uses Twilio-provided URL (http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]) to provide a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call. For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient. Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS Capabilities in PHP[howto_twilio_voice_sms_php]. More information about TwiML can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml], and more information about and other Twilio verbs can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say[twilio_say].
trans-unit.target: The makecall.php code uses Twilio-provided URL (http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]) to provide a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call. For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient. Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS Capabilities in PHP[howto_twilio_voice_sms_php]. More information about TwiML can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml], and more information about and other Twilio verbs can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say[twilio_say].

trans-unit.source: Read the Twilio security guidelines at <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/security[twilio_docs_security]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Read the Twilio security guidelines at <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/security[twilio_docs_security]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about Twilio, see <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs[twilio_docs]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about Twilio, see <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs[twilio_docs]</linkText><title></title>.
